about_the_game:
You have the gift of navigating the nightmares of the deceased to uncover how they died. You're not the only one.
Through an ancient talisman, followers of "The Eye Syndicate" can possess the innocent and abuse them for their extreme ritual interests.

Will you set yourself free from this horrifying nightmare? Will you free the victim of Case 37's possessed soul,
or will you be forever trapped, allowing "The Eye Syndicate" to possess you?

Only you can decide the fate of Vera Herdman, The gifted detective.
